How to install:
1. Run Tradewinds 2_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Ahoy Captain, there's danger ahead! Thieving pirates are out to steal your fortune in Tradewinds 2! Your bravery and good business sense have brought you this far. Fight to the death or flee with your fortune to the next seaport! Earn enough gold to upgrade your ship and engage in land and sea battles. Encounter a fascinating new world while discovering mysterious islands and their inhabitants. Two game modes and over sixty hours of gameplay await you in Tradewinds 2!

#################################################
